desc: Proudly Canadian! We offer Lab Supplies and Scientific Equipment. Specializing in helping small to medium sized businesses acquire the testing supplies they need to deliver their product. Cambridge Environmental has over 25 years experience delivering top quality laboratory items at affordable prices.

layout.text: Trusted with sourcing & distributing your scientific equipment and supplies for over 25 years.
Cambridge is proud to serve you by offering a varied inventory mix, at the lowest prices available - connecting you to our network of manufacturers and suppliers.
